content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-4.5, 24.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -4.5, 24.0)
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5)

### Lab at position(-2.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -2.5, 0.5)

### Furnaces at positions(0.0, 0.0) and (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Ensure that the pipes are properly placed and that there are no obstacles preventing the connection. Verify the positions of the pipes and ensure they are correctly aligned.

### Errors when connecting lab to electric pole
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory to connect the lab to the electric pole. Check your inventory before attempting to make connections.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for any existing entities in the target tile.
